entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.6°C

Observed at: Comox Airport 12:00 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia in the evening and after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023
